mapper.update:
update TB_PLACE
PLACE_NAME = #{placeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE_ADDRESS = #{placeAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE_LONGITUDE = #{placeLongitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE_LATITUDE = #{placeLatitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE_START_TIME = #{placeStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE_END_TIME = #{placeEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLACE_TEL = #{placeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PLACE_ID = #{placeId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
